nodes.text: Claris was a member of a New Republic Intelligence team sent to aid in the liberation of Verkuyl. She worked with the Verkuylian resistance to set explosives around Verkuyls main communications transmitter to cut off the Imperials from outside aid. The transmission she sent to the New Republic fleet in waiting was captured by the Imperials resulting in her arrest. She survived the mission and was released after the fleet was contacted by Selby Jarrad and Verkuyl was liberated.
